attributes.action: support the residents of All Saints and Parkfields, Wolverhampton, in saving the Pheonix Project.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Pheonix Project run by All Saints Action Network (ASAN) has made a real difference to the lives of local residents through the development of a tool library, recycling service and household maintenance scheme. If funded for a further two years we believe that the Phoenix Project will have a self sustaining future in partnership with a range of housing and community agencies. We respectfully ask All Saints and Blakenhall Community Development (ABCD) New Deal for Commuities scheme to reconsider their decision not to fund Phoenix for the remaining 2 years of the ABCD programme. The petition has been created by All Saints Church in All Saints, Wolverhampton.
